data.title: Metal and Steel Fabrication in Canberra
data.meta_description: A.B. Fabrications specialises in welding projects in Canberra. Our metal fabricators produce sturdy gates, fences, furniture, handrails and more. Contact us.
data.text:
A.B. Fabrication is your trusted steel fabricator in Canberra. Combining superior engineering expertise and state-of-the-art machinery, we’ve completed various metal fabrication and welding projects that meet industry standards.

We are a locally owned company, and our metal fabricators are well-versed in approved codes of practice and safety standards around the Canberra region. We use only the highest quality steel supplies from Australia’s leading brands, including Southern Steel and Blue Scope Steel.

Balustrading and StaircasesWe custom design and build elegant and durable balustrades and handrails that can transform your veranda, balcony, or open space. Our balustrades are designed for safety, support and functionality.

Our metal fabricators in Canberra specialise in custom handrails, wrought iron staircases and stainless-steel balustrades for any application. We personalise balustrades to meet your requirements as well as provide both security and visual appeal to your property.

Work with steel fabricators who have produced stem stairs, curved stairs and spiral staircases for clients across the Canberra region. Whether it’s a basic design or an intricate project, we have the skill and experience to get the job done right the first time.

Fencing and arches

Wrought iron is a durable and versatile type of metal that can be welded, hammered, moulded and bent more than any other material. This makes it ideal for both gates and fencing.

A.B. Fabrication offers decorative and protective wrought iron arches and fences that seamlessly blend with modern and traditional architectural designs. With over 30 years of welding experience in Canberra, trust us to approach each project with unmatched precision and engineering expertise.

Furniture

Wrought iron is a multipurpose material that can be used for both indoor and outdoor furniture projects. Our team has proudly worked on mirrors, hall stands, beds, table settings, benches, wall plaques, candelabras, garden arches and more.

If you have a vision in mind, we’ll be happy to create custom-designed furniture that complements your home and meets your preferences.

Artwork

We customise decorative pieces for residential and commercial properties. Our team crafts functional and beautiful house numbers, shop fittings and business signs and logos.

Gates

Enhance your property’s security and curb appeal with bespoke automatic gates. Choose from single, double or sliding gates. Our products are strong, durable and made using premium steel supplies from top brands.
